alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Garland; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Perry; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 3:21PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Perry, northwestern Garland, central Yell and northeastern Montgomery Counties through 400 PM CST... At 321 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fourche Valley to 11 miles southeast of Muddy Creek WMA to near Mount Ida. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Danville... Ola... Fourche Valley... Plainview in Yell County... Petit Jean River WMA... Casa... Aplin... Birta... Nimrod... Wing... Kingston... Mt Tabor... Fannie... Rover... Sunlight Bay Park... Carter Cove Park... Macedonia in Yell County... Deberrie... Mt George... Centerville... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for central and western Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Garland; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Perry; Yell Excluding Northwest
